name: Slug Url
script:
# Server Script for DocType: Tour Package (Doc Event: Before Save)
import frappe
def before_save(doc, method):
    if not doc.slug and doc.package_name:
        slug = frappe.scrub(doc.package_name).replace(' ', '-')
        # ensure uniqueness
        i = 1
        candidate = slug
        while frappe.db.exists('Tour Package', {'slug': candidate}):
            i += 1
            candidate = f"{slug}-{i}"
        doc.slug = candidate
